page.title: 04THE SHEFFORD PRAM RACE
page.content: {The Pram Race}is an event that Shefford holds once every year.The event is ten years old this year. The Pram Race is a very popular occasion and this year about seventy competitors entered it.The race is held on the Sunday before Spring Bank Holiday each year. The race is started and finished at the White Hart public house.The competitors visit each public house in Shefford along the route and drink half a pint of liquid at each one. All the people who enter the race are sponsored and the money raised is donated to the Cancer Research Appeal Fund.
